name: Pan-Seared Chicken Tenderloin
author: Dee
summary: A simple combination of seasonings with olive oil and lemon juice makes these chicken tenderloins so delicious!
ingredients: 4  chicken tenderloins, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 teaspoons paprika, or more to taste
2 teaspoons garlic powder, or more to taste
2 teaspoons onion powder, or more to taste
directions: Coat with 3 tablespoons olive oil, salt, and pepper
Add paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, Cajun seasoning, and chili powder
Toss thoroughly with tongs or a spoon
Heat remaining olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat
Add chicken; cook, covered, for 6 minutes
Squeeze lemon juice over the chicken
Flip and cook until a dark, crispy crust forms on the outside, about 6 minutes more
